mapper.select: SELECT er.request_id, er.buyer_user_id, er.buyer_company_id, cb.company_name_kr AS buyer_company_name, cb.address AS buyer_company_address, cb.address_detail AS buyer_company_address_detail, er.supplier_company_id, cs.company_name_kr AS supplier_company_name, er.status AS request_status, er.detail, er.due_date, er.created_at AS request_created_at, resp.response_id, resp.supplier_user_id, resp.status AS response_status, resp.total_price, resp.payment_terms, resp.warranty, resp.special_terms, resp.created_at AS response_created_at, bu.name_kr AS buyer_user_name, bu.phone_number AS buyer_user_phone, su.name_kr AS supplier_user_name, su.phone_number AS supplier_user_phone, c.contract_id, c.created_at AS contract_created_at FROM estimate_response resp JOIN estimate_request er ON resp.request_id = er.request_id LEFT JOIN contracts c ON c.response_id = resp.response_id JOIN companies cb ON er.buyer_company_id = cb.company_id JOIN companies cs ON er.supplier_company_id = cs.company_id LEFT JOIN users bu ON c.buyer_user_id = bu.user_id LEFT JOIN users su ON c.supplier_user_id = su.user_id WHERE er.request_id = #{requestId} AND resp.response_id = #{responseId}

SELECT item.item_id AS item_item_id, item.request_id AS item_request_id, item.product_id AS item_product_id, item.specification AS item_specification, item.quantity AS item_quantity, meta.category_code AS meta_category_code, meta.category_name AS meta_category_name, meta.detail_category_code AS meta_detail_category_code, meta.detail_category_name AS meta_detail_category_name, resp_item.response_item_id AS resp_item_response_item_id, resp_item.response_id AS resp_item_response_id, resp_item.unit_price AS resp_item_unit_price, resp_item.delivery_days AS resp_item_delivery_days FROM estimate_request_item item LEFT JOIN estimate_response_item resp_item ON item.item_id = resp_item.item_id AND resp_item.response_id = #{responseId} LEFT JOIN product_meta_batch meta ON item.product_id = meta.product_id WHERE item.request_id = #{requestId}

SELECT er.request_id, er.buyer_user_id, er.buyer_company_id, cb.company_name_kr AS buyer_company_name, er.supplier_company_id, cs.company_name_kr AS supplier_company_name, er.status AS request_status, er.detail, er.due_date, er.created_at AS request_created_at FROM estimate_request er JOIN companies cb ON er.buyer_company_id = cb.company_id LEFT JOIN companies cs ON er.supplier_company_id = cs.company_id WHERE er.request_id = #{requestId}

SELECT item.item_id AS item_item_id, item.request_id AS item_request_id, item.product_id AS item_product_id, item.specification AS item_specification, item.quantity AS item_quantity, meta.category_code AS meta_category_code, meta.category_name AS meta_category_name, meta.detail_category_code AS meta_detail_category_code, meta.detail_category_name AS meta_detail_category_name FROM estimate_request_item item LEFT JOIN product_meta_batch meta ON item.product_id = meta.product_id WHERE item.request_id = #{requestId}

SELECT er.request_id, er.buyer_user_id, er.buyer_company_id, cb.company_name_kr AS buyer_company_name, er.supplier_company_id, cs.company_name_kr AS supplier_company_name, er.status AS request_status, er.detail, er.due_date, er.created_at AS request_created_at, resp.response_id, resp.supplier_user_id, resp.status AS response_status, resp.total_price, resp.payment_terms, resp.warranty, resp.special_terms, resp.created_at AS response_created_at FROM estimate_request er LEFT JOIN estimate_response resp ON er.request_id = resp.request_id LEFT JOIN companies cb ON er.buyer_company_id = cb.company_id LEFT JOIN companies cs ON er.supplier_company_id = cs.company_id WHERE er.buyer_company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY er.created_at DESC

SELECT er.request_id, er.buyer_user_id, er.buyer_company_id, cb.company_name_kr AS buyer_company_name, er.supplier_company_id, cs.company_name_kr AS supplier_company_name, er.status AS request_status, er.detail, er.due_date, er.created_at AS request_created_at, resp.response_id, resp.supplier_user_id, resp.status AS response_status, resp.total_price, resp.payment_terms, resp.warranty, resp.special_terms, resp.created_at AS response_created_at FROM estimate_request er LEFT JOIN estimate_response resp ON er.request_id = resp.request_id LEFT JOIN companies cb ON er.buyer_company_id = cb.company_id LEFT JOIN companies cs ON er.supplier_company_id = cs.company_id WHERE er.supplier_company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY er.created_at DESC

SELECT c.contract_id AS contractId, q.request_id AS requestId, r.response_id AS responseId, c.supplier_company_id AS supplierCompanyId, r.total_price AS totalPrice, DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS contractDate, q.due_date AS dueDate FROM contracts c JOIN estimate_response r ON c.response_id = r.response_id JOIN estimate_request q ON r.request_id = q.request_id WHERE c.buyer_company_id = #{companyId}
AND c.buyer_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.contract_id AS contractId, q.request_id AS requestId, r.response_id AS responseId, c.supplier_company_id AS supplierCompanyId, r.total_price AS totalPrice, DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS contractDate, q.due_date AS dueDate FROM contracts c JOIN estimate_response r ON c.response_id = r.response_id JOIN estimate_request q ON r.request_id = q.request_id WHERE c.supplier_company_id = #{companyId}
AND c.supplier_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT CASE WHEN er.status = 3 THEN c.contract_id WHEN er.status = 4 THEN er.request_id ELSE NULL END AS contractId,
er.detail AS details,
DATE( CASE WHEN er.status = 3 THEN c.created_at WHEN er.status = 4 THEN er.created_at ELSE NULL END ) AS contractDate,
CASE WHEN er.status = 3 THEN eresp.total_price WHEN er.status = 4 THEN NULL ELSE NULL END AS totalPrice,
CASE WHEN er.status = 4 THEN '1' -- 미체결 WHEN er.status = 3 AND c.status = 1 THEN '2' -- 계약 중 WHEN er.status = 3 AND c.status = 2 THEN '3' -- 계약 완료 ELSE NULL END AS status
FROM estimate_request er LEFT JOIN estimate_response eresp ON eresp.request_id = er.request_id LEFT JOIN contracts c ON c.response_id = eresp.response_id
WHERE (er.buyer_company_id = #{companyId} OR er.supplier_company_id = #{companyId}) AND er.status IN (3, 4)
ORDER BY COALESCE(c.created_at, er.created_at) DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM contracts WHERE status = #{status} AND (buyer_company_id = #{companyId} OR supplier_company_id = #{companyId})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM estimate_request WHERE status IN (1, 2) AND (buyer_company_id = #{companyId} OR supplier_company_id = #{companyId})
mapper.update: UPDATE contracts SET status = 2 WHERE contract_id = #{contractId} AND status = 1
